div.p:
羽根 (はね) — feather
羽毛 (うもう) — feathers
羽目 (はめ) — panel
白羽 (しらは) — white feather
切羽詰まる (せっぱつまる) — to be at one's wits' end
羽衣 (うい) — angel's raiment
羽織 (はおり) — haori (Japanese formal coat)
羽ばたく (はばたく) — to flap (wings)
羽化 (うか) — emergence (of insects)
羽振り (はぶり) — plumage
羽子板 (はごいた) — battledore (early form of badminton racket)
切り羽 (きりは) — face (of a wall of coal or ore, etc.)
羽織る (はおる) — to put on
手羽 (てば) — chicken wing
千羽鶴 (せんばづる) — many (traditionally 1000) paper cranes
羽音 (はおと) — sound of flapping wings (of a bird)
三羽烏 (さんばがらす) — trio
羽二重 (はぶたえ) — habutai
陣羽織 (じんばおり) — battle surcoat
羽織袴 (はおりはかま) — Japanese male formal attire

This page was generated using kanjioftheday, written by Douglas Paul Perkins. Kanji lists came from the Ministry of Education. Example words are derived from a word frequency list by Alexandre Girardi. Dictionary information is taken from KANJIDIC2 and EDICT.
